definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: A button has come off my coat.
sentences.chinese: 我的上衣掉了一個釦子。

sentences.english: All right. Let me help you button your shirt.
sentences.chinese: 好，我來幫你扣襯衫釦子。

sentences.english: Mike is sewing a button on his coat.
sentences.chinese: 麥克在給他的大衣釘釦子。

sentences.english: Another one helped to sew the button onto his shirt.
sentences.chinese: 另一個隊員幫他把釦子縫在襯衣上。

sentences.english: My coat is missing a button , could you sew on the same kind?
sentences.chinese: 我衣服丟了一個釦子，能給釘上一個相同的嗎？

sentences.english: On a three-button jacket, you button the middle; the top button is optional.
sentences.chinese: 三個釦子的外套，你扣住中間的，頂上的隨意。

sentences.english: BRASS】He has brass buttons on his jackets.
sentences.chinese: 他的夾克上有黃銅釦子。

sentences.english: Which company are the poppers sourced from?
sentences.chinese: 釦子是來源於哪個公司的？

sentences.english: His figure was enveloped in a riding cloak, fur collared and steel clasped;
sentences.chinese: 他身上裹着騎手披風，戴着皮毛領，繫着鋼釦子。

sentences.english: Maybe it's a cashmere cardigan without buttons.
sentences.chinese: 也許這會是一件沒有釦子的開司米羊毛衫。

sentences.english: The sweater is easy to take off as it buttons through.
sentences.chinese: 這種毛衣從上到下是用釦子扣的，所以容易脫下來。

sentences.english: I couldnt find the button, so I just sewed up the buttonhole.
sentences.chinese: 我找不到釦子，所以我只把釦眼兒給縫上了。

sentences.english: My colleague was still buttoning his shirt up.
She used a needle to sew the button onto the shirt.
sentences.chinese: 她用針把釦子釘到襯衫上。

sentences.english: I reached instinctively for my middle button, and then thought, sod it.
sentences.chinese: 我本能地抓住中間那粒釦子，心裏想，糟了。

definition: collar/neckband/neckline/the place where the two ends of a collar meet
